Summary: Sequence of orange flashing lights in the shape of a disc that disappeared and then reappeared over the ocean
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Marathon
There were no other sightings in Marathon on or around November 19th 2012
divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were standing on a pier at around 8:15 pm in marathon, fl when one of us spotted something out in the distance over the ocean that looked like a disc surrounded by a sequence of glowing and pulsating orange\red lights. it was about the size of a penny and stayed in the sky for about 2-3 minutes until its lights slowly faded away. we saw it again about 10 minutes later, this time it was about as big as a golf ball\baseball and continued the same sequence of light motion as t had before. it was closer to shore this time and was easy to observe. from a closer distance, you could tell that the orange\red exterior lights were rotating around a disc shaped object. the strange thing about this object was this is was see through and could not be seen. it stayed the second time for about 1 minute and 30 seconds until it faded away again. this was te last time we saw the object.
